name: Celestial Whispers
description: The Celestial Whispers is a secluded, dome-roofed astrology shop offering a variety of services including horoscope creation, astrological consultations, and educational classes. The shop, adorned with celestial-themed decor and filled with the scent of incense, houses an array of astrological tools and ancient scrolls. The owner, <u>Magdalena Celestia Ravenscraft</u>, is a regal, middle-aged woman with a passion for astrology, who conducts charting work in a private back room. Her apprentice, <u>Thaddeus Esselward</u>, is a curious young man responsible for basic chart preparation, library maintenance, and client interaction.

items.name: Ephemeris Scroll showing star and planet positions by date

quest.name: The Celestial Heirloom
quest.description: While perusing the astrology shop, a visitor discovers a crystal that shimmers when they pick it up. It floods their mind with images of a hidden realm where the spirits of the stars reside and promises a great reward for the one who can open the gateway. They are placed under a geas to perform this quest, immediately purchase the crystal, and seek out an adventuring crew to follow the path unfolding in their mind as the journey progresses. The crystal will speak to whatever crew they find, promising untold riches for the successful completion of the mission.
